lines.text: [in checkout]

[looks at one of Chris's items and sort of scolds]
Eating between meals.

[mimicking]
Eating between meals.
[Reading the police profile on Maria McGuire]
And, the moment we've all been waiting for... 313 pounds.
313 pounds? Let me see that.
I would imagine that's fully clothed.
Oh my God, she could be the house! I hate this job!

[seeing Phil and Jack leave, laughing about something]
Yeah, I smell a rat, they are up to something. I don't know what it is, but they are up to something. I'm going to find out what it is
[he raises binoculars to his eyes, lowers them, then turns to Chris]
Do you know what it is?

[casually, with a straight face]
Yeah, I think I have a pretty good idea
What, what, tell me?

[Turns at Chris' gesture, and sees that ink coating the rims of the binoculars is now around each eye, making him look like a racoon]
Son of a bitch! Christ, I'm gonna *kill* 'em!

[looking in the refrigerator]
I don't believe this. They ate all the food and left dog turds in the fridge.
Don't worry. I'll go to the supermarket. What do you want?
Truth and justice.
Anything else?
Doughnuts.
Why not? We *are* cops.
[on the phone with Bill while at Maria's place]
I'll be about half an hour.
Where are my donuts you prick?
Maybe more.

[arriving at docks]
Come on! Let's go.

[sees Chris]
Jesus Christ! That guy's a cop.

[sarcastic]
I know he's a cop! His hands are cuffed!
Not him! The other one.

[whilst searching Maria's house, Chris holds up a newspaper clipping about Montgomery]
Now is no time to be pausing for the news, Chris
Now is no time to be pausing for the news, Chris
[Chris continues his search]

Ah - we have a letter. 'Dear Maria, I hear you are doing okay. I hear you are seeing a couple of guys. Sometimes I get so mad I could wipe out the entire world, and enjoy myself doing it'. Now how could she have dumped a charmer like him?

[during an argument about who killed Kennedy, Bill checks the fridge]
Those bastards. They ate everything and left us a dog turd.
Ralph Warren left us a dog turd?
No, Phil and Jack. I am gonna get those guys. I don't know how, but I will.
Give me the keys. I'll go to the supermarket. What do you want?
Truth and justice.
Anything else?
Doughnuts.
Why not? We're cops.

[Chris and Bill are whiling away the time playing trivia questions]
Okay, I got one, name the 16th President
I don't know
Here's a hint...
Abraham Lincoln.

[His questions are identifying quotes]
Okay, "This was no boating accident!"
No idea
Man, you suck at this
Isn't love great, Chris? One minute you're a god, the next minute you're a scum-suckin' pig.
[after Marie hit him]
Don't you *ever* hit me.

[to Maria]
You broke my heart.
[after robbing gas station]
How much we got?
That's good. As long as we have gas money, that's all we need.
Yeah. But its hardly worth rubbing people out for.

[defensive]
What?

[doesn't want to try to explain]
Nothing.
Hey. What'd I tell you about touching my books.

[raising his voice]
I didn't touch your dirty fag rags!
Oh yeah! Well then who the hell else did, since its just you and me in here.
Piss off!
Don't f*cking tell me to piss off.
I just did asshole.
[the two start fighting]
Problem?
